LanguageData.Unease.stages.0.label: unease
LanguageData.Unease.stages.0.description: What am I doing here? Why am I here?
LanguageData.Unease.stages.1.label: unease
LanguageData.Unease.stages.1.description: This can't be ... I don't belong here ...
LanguageData.Unease.stages.2.label: unease
LanguageData.Unease.stages.2.description: This must be a nightmare! I want to wake up. WAKE UP!
LanguageData.Unease.stages.3.label: unease
LanguageData.Unease.stages.3.description: Why, why, why, why, why, why? WHY? I HATE ALL OF THIS!
LanguageData.Unease.stages.4.label: unease
LanguageData.Unease.stages.4.description: NO WAY OUT! ... No way out ... no ... way ... out ...
LanguageData.Unease.stages.5.label: unease
LanguageData.Unease.stages.5.description: ... It ... will ... stop ... I ... make it ... stop ... all of it ...
